00047 #ifndef CRYPTOPLUS_NULLABLE_HPP
00048 #define CRYPTOPLUS_NULLABLE_HPP
00049 
00050 namespace cryptoplus
00051 {
00055         class nullable_base
00056         {
00057                 protected:
00058 
00062                         typedef void (nullable_base::*bool_type)() const;
00063 
00067                         void this_type_does_not_support_comparisons() const {}
00068 
00072                         nullable_base() {}
00073 
00077                         nullable_base(const nullable_base&) {}
00078 
00082                         nullable_base& operator=(const nullable_base&)
00083                         {
00084                                 return *this;
00085                         }
00086 
00090                         ~nullable_base() {}
00091         };
00092 
00096         template <typename T=void> class nullable : public nullable_base
00097         {
00098                 public:
00099 
00103                         operator bool_type() const
00104                         {
00105                                 return (static_cast<const T*>(this))->boolean_test() ? &nullable_base::this_type_does_not_support_comparisons : 0;
00106                         }
00107 
00108                 protected:
00109 
00110                         ~nullable() {}
00111         };
00112 
00116         template <> class nullable<void> : public nullable_base
00117         {
00118                 public:
00119 
00123                         operator bool_type() const
00124                         {
00125                                 return (boolean_test() == true) ? &nullable<void>::this_type_does_not_support_comparisons : 0;
00126                         }
00127 
00128                 protected:
00129 
00137                         virtual bool boolean_test() const = 0;
00138                         virtual ~nullable() {}
00139         };
00140 
00147         template <typename T, typename U> void operator==(const nullable<T>& lhs,const nullable<U>& rhs)
00148         {
00149                 lhs.this_type_does_not_support_comparisons();
00150 
00151                 return false;
00152         }
00153 
00160         template <typename T, typename U> void operator!=(const nullable<T>& lhs,const nullable<U>& rhs)
00161         {
00162                 lhs.this_type_does_not_support_comparisons();
00163 
00164                 return false;
00165         }
00166 }
00167 
00168 #endif /* CRYPTOPLUS_NULLABLE_HPP */
